H0.text: Montmorency is a variety of which fruit. Plum

H1.text: Montmorency is a variety of which fruit. Apricot

H2.text: Montmorency is a variety of which fruit. Peach

H3.text: Montmorency is a variety of which fruit. CHERRY

A4.text: The Montmorency cherry (also known as the Common red Kentish) is a cultivar of sour cherry (Prunus cerasus).
